definitions: A large marine reptile with a bony or leathery shell and flippers, coming ashore annually on sandy beaches to lay eggs.
The flesh of a sea turtle, especially the green turtle, used chiefly for soup.
A freshwater reptile related to the sea turtles and tortoises.
Any reptile of the order Chelonia, including the terrapins and tortoises.
A directional cursor in a computer graphics system which can be instructed to move around a screen.
